languages.text: "Его цвета... смешаны слишком чудно. Алый затмевает взор плотной пеленой, но все вокруг сияет золотом и серебром. И цвета не окрашивают друг друга... Мне кажется, Его Светлость Каллигос Винтерскейл просто не видит истинного цвета своих поступков".

traits.locale_text: "Его цвета... смешаны слишком чудно. Алый затмевает взор плотной пеленой, но все вокруг сияет золотом и серебром. И цвета не окрашивают друг друга... Мне кажется, Его Светлость Каллигос Винтерскейл просто не видит истинного цвета своих поступков".

languages.text: "His palette... is mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."
languages.original_text: "Его цвета... смешаны слишком чудно. Алый затмевает взор плотной пеленой, но все вокруг сияет золотом и серебром. И цвета не окрашивают друг друга... Мне кажется, Его Светлость Каллигос Винтерскейл просто не видит истинного цвета своих поступков".

traits.locale_text: "His colours... are mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."

"His palette... is mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."

languages.text: «Su paleta... se entremezcla de un modo muy extraño. El rojo cubre por completo sus ojos, pero a su alrededor todo brilla con un halo de oro y plata. Creo que milord Calligos Winterscale sencillamente no distingue los verdaderos colores de sus actos».
languages.original_text: "His palette... is mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."

traits.locale_text: «Sus colores... se entremezclan de un modo muy extraño. El rojo cubre por completo sus ojos, pero a su alrededor todo brilla con un halo de oro y plata. Creo que milord Calligos Winterscale sencillamente no distingue los verdaderos colores de sus actos».

languages.text: “他的颜色……以非常古怪的方式混合在一起。红色完全遮蔽了他的眼睛，但他周围的一切都散发着金色与银色的光芒。我认为，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔根本没有意识到自己这么做究竟是出于什么原因。”
languages.original_text: "His palette... is mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."

traits.locale_text: “他的颜色……以某种非常古怪奇怪的方式混合在一起。红色完全遮蔽了他的眼睛，但他周围的一切都散发着金色与银色的光芒。我认为，卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔根本没有意识到自己这么做究竟是出于什么原因。”

languages.text: « Sa palette... se mélange de façon étrange. Le rouge recouvre totalement ses yeux, mais autour de lui, tout brille d'argent et d'or. Je crois que le seigneur Calligos Winterscale ne voit pas les véritables couleurs de ses actes. »
languages.original_text: "His palette... is mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."

traits.locale_text: « Ses couleurs... se mélangent de façon étrange. Le rouge recouvre totalement ses yeux, mais autour de lui, tout brille d'argent et d'or. Je crois que le seigneur Calligos Winterscale ne voit pas les véritables couleurs de ses actes. »

languages.text: 「彼のパレットは…とても奇妙な色で混ざっているわ。赤は彼の目を完全に覆っているけれど、彼の周りのものはすべて金と銀に輝いている。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、自分の行いの本当の色を見ていないのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "His palette... is mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."

traits.locale_text: 「彼のパレットは…とても奇妙な色で混ざっているわ。赤は彼の目を完全に覆っているけれど、彼の周りのものはすべて金と銀に輝いている。カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、自分の行いの本当の色を見ていないのでしょう」

languages.text: "Seine Palette ... ist auf äußerst merkwürdige Weise vermischt. Das Rot bedeckt seine Augen vollständig, doch alles um ihn herum leuchtet golden und silbern. Ich glaube, dass seine Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder schlicht die wahren Farben seiner Taten nicht sieht."
languages.original_text: "His palette... is mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Farben ... sind auf äußerst merkwürdige Weise vermischt. Das Rot bedeckt seine Augen vollständig, doch alles um ihn herum leuchtet golden und silbern. Ich glaube, dass seine Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder schlicht die wahren Farben seiner Taten nicht sieht."

languages.text: "Paleti... Çok tuhaf bir biçimde karışmış. Kırmızı, gözlerini tamamen kaplıyor. Etrafındaki her şeyse altın ve gümüş renklerde parıldıyor. Sanırım tüm bunlar, Lord Calligos Winterscale Hazretleri'nin yaptıklarının gerçek rengini görememesinden ibaret."
languages.original_text: "His palette... is mixed in a very strange way. The red completely covers his eyes, but everything around him glows gold and silver. I think that His Lordship Calligos Winterscale simply does not see the true colours of his deeds."
